title: ipbxensetupz
author: ipbxensetupz
created_time: April 06, 2023, 09:49:31 PMLast edit: May 28, 2023, 05:24:18 PM by ipbxensetupz
content: Setting up Invison Community or vBulletin or XenForo forums at very good prices.I can setup the latest Invision Community or vBulletin or XenForo for the creation of a forum.I work at good very good prices.I will just setup the latest version of any of those.The price depends based on what you want me to do and how advanced the forum/board should be.The more you pay the better it is and the more features it has. I will install anything you want on them.I won't design logos, you need logo designers for those, I can put the logo you have from another logo designer on the forum, but I won't design any logos or any graphical stuff, I just setup the boards.Contact me anytime and I will begin work immediately, I will use hosting of your choice where the forum should be hosted online or I will recommend you some hosting providers where you can host your forum myself.The more expensive plan you take the better, you can see all of it there, it's where your forum is hosted and the forum plan you choose from the forum software providers themselves.Contact me if you need my services for online forums creation.My price is exactly 500$ for the setup/creation of any forum excluding the required software/hosting bills and everything and I will work very fast so you don't have to wait too long for the forum to appear online on the internet.The 500$ price includes only my work and not the software itself for the boards, so you can look at 500$+ - 1250$+ or it can go higher depending on how advanced you want it to be.For prices of the software itself used for the creation of the forum forums see the following links...Any additional Applications or Plugins for the forum itself cost extra and can be seen inside the admincp or where plugins are located on the software vendor site itself.Things we need:1. Hosting (paid monthly, quarterly, or yearly) up to you2. Domain name - make sure you know a name already when you contact me (example: Bla.com, cars.com, whatever.com...) make sure you already know the name before contacting me.3. What the forum should be about, don't ask me for suggestions. Make sure you already know what it should be about.Software of your choice that we will work with, see pices here:1. invisioncommunity.com2. vbulletin.com3. xenforo.comGet into contact with me on telegram or via PM.Get into contact with me easy via telegram:Telegram : @cleardoubt2023Thank you!You can earn money this way with forum rank upgrades payments, donations, ads, whatever, as long as people sign-up on your forum and is popular and you always post content and stuff on it you should be earning some good money. Same as any other forum...Things you need:Credit Card or Paypal or both to be sure (for the forum software/license itself, paying for it) with money on it Â - PRICE DEPENDS totally on how many features/plugins/and upgrades the forum should have, it can range from 500$+ to 1250$ or more. They have a lot of plugins/features and stuffBitcoin or Ethereum or Litecoin or any other cryptocurrency which is on coinmarketcap.com, and it must be supported by binance.com for exchange - 75 (for paying me for the work, I will work very fast)For the 500$ I offer 3 months assistance if you need sometimes or if you have any questions for maximum of 2 hours a day included in the 500$ price. If you pay extra I will work full time to assist or implement anything on your forum. 2.50$ for every 1 hour of work which is extra. I will also teach everything about admincp (admin control panel) usage in those 2 hours, and it should be easy to teach you, aswell as phpmyadmin administration of the forum.You can extend the 3 months period of time of assistance by paying 200$ for every additional 3 months or pay 10$ per hour if you need less than 3 months.If you run into trouble and the forum has any problems and it goes down I offer 9 months warranty and always instantly contact me and I will make your forum back up and running free of charge.Please keep backups at all times of your forums, make a backup at least every 1-6 days so you don't loose any data and store them securely. I will show you exactly how to do that.

comments.author: ipbxensetupz
comments.body: First 2 customers wil get a price of 100$ instead of 350$ for the services I am providing.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: ipbxensetupz on April 06, 2023, 09:49:31 PMThe 100$ price includes only my work and not the software itself for the boards, so you can look at 300$+ - 750$+ or it can go higher depending on how advanced you want it to be.For prices of the software itself used for the creation of the forum forums see the following links...Any additional Applications or Plugins for the forum itself cost extra and can be seen inside the admincp or where plugins are located on the software vendor site itself.So if a potential client wants to set up vbulletin.com how is your service different from vbulletin.com support and tutorials https://www.vbulletin.com/en/learn-moreWhy would I spend $100 or more when there are supports coming from vbulletin.com through ticket and their tutorials?

comments.author: ipbxensetupz
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on April 14, 2023, 11:58:48 PMQuote from: ipbxensetupz on April 06, 2023, 09:49:31 PMThe 100$ price includes only my work and not the software itself for the boards, so you can look at 300$+ - 750$+ or it can go higher depending on how advanced you want it to be.For prices of the software itself used for the creation of the forum forums see the following links...Any additional Applications or Plugins for the forum itself cost extra and can be seen inside the admincp or where plugins are located on the software vendor site itself.So if a potential client wants to set up vbulletin.com how is your service different from vbulletin.com support and tutorials https://www.vbulletin.com/en/learn-moreWhy would I spend $100 or more when there are supports coming from vbulletin.com through ticket and their tutorials?True, this is the only service I can provide for now, I wasn't aware, what should the price be, what do you personaly suggest and recommend the price to be? Because it's hard to setup a forum and I must live somehow, or you just won't let me earn money via work, or what's bad about it because I am aware it's hard to setup a forum and many don't know how perfectly and run into many troubles actually and in real this it is way easier to just pay because I have setup many forums before and have vast experiece?Will you hire me for other work in real life or are you here just to destroy me?Don't want my work to exist, don't want me to be able to live? Tell me. I have no other business at the moment and in desperate need of any kind of work and this si good honest legit hard earned work money and all, and I even setup a low price as far as I know and am aware, go and provide cheaper than me if you hate me, don't juts come here to destroy me, because we're all human and must work something and there's no work here for me, thank you.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: ipbxensetupz on April 15, 2023, 12:00:29 AMQuote from: robelneo on April 14, 2023, 11:58:48 PMQuote from: ipbxensetupz on April 06, 2023, 09:49:31 PMThe 100$ price includes only my work and not the software itself for the boards, so you can look at 300$+ - 750$+ or it can go higher depending on how advanced you want it to be.For prices of the software itself used for the creation of the forum forums see the following links...Any additional Applications or Plugins for the forum itself cost extra and can be seen inside the admincp or where plugins are located on the software vendor site itself.So if a potential client wants to set up vbulletin.com how is your service different from vbulletin.com support and tutorials https://www.vbulletin.com/en/learn-moreWhy would I spend $100 or more when there are supports coming from vbulletin.com through ticket and their tutorials?True, this is the only service I can provide for now, I wasn't aware, what should the price be, what do you personaly suggest and recommend the price to be? Because it's hard to setup a forum and I must live somehow, or you just won't let me earn money via work, or what's bad about it because I am aware it's hard to setup a forum and many don't know how perfectly and run into many troubles actually and in real this is easier to just pay because I have setup many forums before and have vast experiece?Will you hire me for other work in real life or are you here just to destroy me?I don't want to bust your service but it's important for would-be forum administrators to learn the basic launching and troubleshooting and leave the advance upgrades to the software manufacturer, it would cost you thousands of dollars if you rely on support for simple installation and edit, like what you mentioned in your service. You're specifically saying that the admin should just rely on your service.There should be a part where you will have to leave the admin to do his part.If you have vast experience you know the easy and hard parts will you still charge for the easy part?

comments.author: ipbxensetupz
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on April 15, 2023, 12:05:16 AMQuote from: ipbxensetupz on April 15, 2023, 12:00:29 AMQuote from: robelneo on April 14, 2023, 11:58:48 PMQuote from: ipbxensetupz on April 06, 2023, 09:49:31 PMThe 100$ price includes only my work and not the software itself for the boards, so you can look at 300$+ - 750$+ or it can go higher depending on how advanced you want it to be.For prices of the software itself used for the creation of the forum forums see the following links...Any additional Applications or Plugins for the forum itself cost extra and can be seen inside the admincp or where plugins are located on the software vendor site itself.So if a potential client wants to set up vbulletin.com how is your service different from vbulletin.com support and tutorials https://www.vbulletin.com/en/learn-moreWhy would I spend $100 or more when there are supports coming from vbulletin.com through ticket and their tutorials?True, this is the only service I can provide for now, I wasn't aware, what should the price be, what do you personaly suggest and recommend the price to be? Because it's hard to setup a forum and I must live somehow, or you just won't let me earn money via work, or what's bad about it because I am aware it's hard to setup a forum and many don't know how perfectly and run into many troubles actually and in real this is easier to just pay because I have setup many forums before and have vast experiece?Will you hire me for other work in real life or are you here just to destroy me?I don't want to bust your service but it's important for would-be forum administrators to learn the basic launching and troubleshooting and leave the advance upgrades to the software manufacturer, it would cost you thousands of dollars if you rely on support for simple installation and edit, like what you mentioned in your service. You're specifically saying that the admin should just rely on your service.There should be a part where you will have to leave the admin to do his part.If you have vast experience you know the easy and hard parts will you still charge for the easy part?Whatever I will wait for customers.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: ipbxensetupz on April 15, 2023, 12:00:29 AMDon't want my work to exist, don't want me to be able to live? Tell me. I have no other business at the moment and in desperate need of any kind of work and this si good honest legit hard earned work money and all, and I even setup a low price as far as I know and am aware, go and provide cheaper than me if you hate me, don't juts come here to destroy me, because we're all human and must work something and there's no work here for me, thank you.Take it easy young man my question is legit and it's the same question I asked one freelancer who helped me when I first set up my first forum you should and can accommodate all questions because it will show how professional you are in dealing with questions about your service.First I never offer forum set-up service second I maintain that a forum or any website administrator should be encouraged to learn how to manage his website something that is not on your service that is what I learned from the guy who helped me set up my first forum, there should be a part where you can leave the administrator to manage his forum, I believe you should include that in your service, people will surely get your service if part of your service is teaching them how to run their forum.But it's your service so it's your terms, I rest my case.

comments.author: ipbxensetupz
comments.created_time: April 15, 2023, 01:02:36 AMLast edit: April 15, 2023, 04:25:19 AM by ipbxensetupz

comments.author: giammangiato
comments.body: I would like to ask you a question about XenForoDo you happen to know if there is an android client that allows you to write in this forum? it would be very usefulI use some xenforum forums and they are uncomfortable on a mobile phone

comments.author: ipbxensetupz
comments.body: Quote from: giammangiato on April 15, 2023, 08:16:38 AMI would like to ask you a question about XenForoDo you happen to know if there is an android client that allows you to write in this forum? it would be very usefulI use some xenforum forums and they are uncomfortable on a mobile phoneTry Opera,Firefox... both should work fine, try switch "Desktop view" or something like that.Every time I browse xenforo it worked just fine for me, try desktop view on mobile or the mobile view both should work fine as long as the xenforo is updated to the latest version, I see no issues in them.I don't get your question but try desktop/mobile view and try different browsers on your mobile phone, hope that helps, otherwise if nothing works out try to just use a laptop/tablet or something like that, or just use a PC if all fails, that's all I know.
